WorkItem.Description:
For some reason the ZoomControl cannot be used in .NET 4. (KeyNotFoundException during xaml parsing, seems to be related to styles.)

Don't know if this is a bug the beta, or a broken assumption from ZoomControl.

Comments.Message:
When I compile the library and samples application under .Net 4 I get a "Key cannot be null exception".  Is there likely to be a release of the library that works with .Net 4 in the near future, or should I look for alternatives (or roll my own)?

Thanks
I get a similar crash if I have multiple zoom controls in my wpf control.
